channel.title: Make all folders view options the same
channel.description:
If there's one thing I hate, it's browsing through folders and one folder is in the list format and the other is in giant icon format and etc.
I've tried changing the view options and applying to all folders and whatnot but it's still happening.
I want every single folder I open or look or even think of to have the same view, list view, unless I say otherwise.
There's got to be an option to do that. I tried resetting all folders to defaults but nothing ever works.

item.description:

You should mention this is windows.

On Folder Options>View.
Deselect “Remember each folders view settings”
Should work…
